showerReviews.reviewText: Excellent gym and workout place. The place is clean, not too crowded and had array of equipments. The basketball court, indoor and outdoor pool and variety of aerobics, spinning classes make it real fun place to be. We tried two nearby …

The workers are very nice and helpful. But its hard to navigate the place if you haven't been there before and the shower doesn't show which way to turn for hot vs cold water. The swim area doesn't have a play area for small children. The swimsuit spinner machine was out of order.

Unlike the YMCA and the Lodge of Des Peres, the J provides towels (Large Ones), shampoo, body wash, conditioner, etc. The water pressure that comes out of the shower heads is simply amazing. Literally your cleaned from head to toe within 2 …

What a pleasure to visit the J!! My mom is a member and I came in as a guest (I live out of town). The facility is super clean and the equipment is well maintained and current. I took a spin class with Alana that was every bit as …

Very clean facility and professional staff. Both locations are excellent but I now prefer Chesterfield bc it’s less crowded which is important during the pandemic. Right now the mask policy requires masks when not working out and there is …

… Large facility. They protected the gymnasium floor and it was easy to walk on. Lots of electrical outlets. Lots of exercise equipment. Shower facilities in lower level. Only two restroom stalls for women. Clean. Friendly staff to greet you.
Great venue for baby shower or similar event. The workers were super nice. Nice clean, well maintained building. Good location with lots of parking.
Attended a baby shower there. Large rooms, nice, clean bathrooms. Staff on hand in the lobby to assist with questions

showerReviews.reviewText: Good place to keep fit in very friendly atmosphere. It is kept clean and tidy all day long. Some facilities need to be renewed and upgraded especially showers and bathroom area. The hot top should be a little bigger and renovated. The staffs are excellent with friendly attitude.

I just left the Pointe and there was a dead rabbit on the walkway next to the circle drive.  When I walked in to inform the front desk, I was looked at like I was speaking a foreign language. I figured someone would want to clean it up before the parents had to explain why Thumper was lying dead on their way to swim lessons.
Thirty years later this place is still clean and pristine; definitely worth the membership or even a day pass! Thank you staff and city of Ballwin for keeping this place up and running.

showerReviews.reviewText: The Pavillion we had was somewhat elevated so that you had a good breeze and nice shade the entire time we were there. With access to the park center for nice bathrooms right next door and the water park within walking distance, its a very decent park. Plenty of parking and a good sized playground area make it extremely family friendly.

We went to Tons of Trucks and then the playground. We really enjoyed it. Very nice playground that is still in the older style. Cool log cabin and picnic area. Plenty of room to run! Nicely kept and clean.
Nice evening event. However there were signs that said bathrooms are open but the bathrooms weren't open.

showerReviews.reviewText:
Great pool and water slides!

The lazy river is great, the water is clean, the staff is friendly and the …

Love this pool! So much to do and very clean! Also VERY impressed with the lifeguards. They are alert, friendly and take their job seriously. Not always the case with younger guards. I saw them in action a few times and safety always comes first.
Loved this water park! Took our granddaughter here and she loved the kiddie slide and the lazy river. My only issue was the restrooms were so dirty.
This is the most amazing water park I ever visited. Water is clean, lots of slides, many life guards, rest room and cost effective. Super like for kids and families!!!
Always a great time. We love going for the 4th of July!  You can swim late and watch the fireworks!!!!!  Usually pretty clean.

locations.title: RiverChase YMCA
locations.street: 990 Horan DrCommunity recreation & aquatics centerOpens soon 6 am
locations.content: RiverChase YMCA may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I was at the Rec Center for a baby shower in one of the party rooms. The facility was nice. I have been in the same party room for 2 parties and both times the temperature in the room was too hot. The parking lot was a mess when I was there …

We were there throwing a baby shower in the community room, and it was a nice place! We were a little disappointed that there were a couple unnecessary things being stored in the room that we booked, but overall it was really awesome!
Attended baby shower there. It was nice enough. They had a kitchen area to prepare food. Fridge and I think ice machine.

locations.title: Eise Park
locations.content: Eise Park may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: The best part about this park is splash pad. Apart from that there is a huge play area, barbecue options, benches, basket ball court and restrooms. A quick stop and kids will go crazy !

This is a fun park to visit.  Because, it's tucked away inside a neighborhood, its easy to manage more than one little child or toddler.  The splash pad is ideal for younger children and the playsets, pavilion, and bathrooms are well maintained.  The basketball court needs an upgrade and I wish there were more picnic tables.

showerReviews.reviewText: … limited to under 150lbs and one person at a time (bottle neck).  The interactive water effects (shooters, rope activated showers, etc) were removed. Shower facilities are bright and spacious....very nice. The concession stand seating …

… have our entire family come here and it has a little bit of something for everybody. Has the deep pool with diving board and high slide, shower pool with two kids slides, fairly large swimming pool, lazy river and multiple young kid areas. …
